duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain a customer-centric environment, ensuring exceptional customer service and customer first mentality.
Provide leadership and mentoring to PT Store Supervisors and Sales Associates in sales, inventory, cash management, and customer follow-up.
Drive top-line sales and manage controllable contribution, spending at least 60% of the shift performing Leader on Duty tasks.
Train, coach, and direct PT Store Supervisors and Sales Associates on merchandise handling, shipment processing, and visual techniques.
Facilitate new hire onboarding and training for various skill levels, as well as arrange and execute suitable training solutions for other team members based on performance.
Support daily merchandising, styling, floor set planning and execution, replenishment, launches, updates, shipment, and inventory management.

Ensure floor is replenished per company guidelines, follow up with staff to ensure accuracy, and manage service, merchandising, and operational standards through company-defined practices and processes.
Evaluate customer surveys and execute action plans to enhance the in-store customer experience.
Adapt to a fast-paced environment, manage multiple priorities, and set the tone and standards that drive customer satisfaction and business recognition within the market.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, with relevant retail work experience (college degree preferred).
